revised_title: Fast-Neutron Breeder Fission Reactor: Scientific and Engineering Developments
tldr: This article discusses the fast-neutron breeder reactor, a technology that aims to exploit the abundant isotope of uranium for energy production. It covers the scientific and engineering developments in this field, including fuel processing, reactor design, and safety measures. The article also highlights the potential benefits and challenges of this technology in terms of energy resources and environmental impact.
